data: {"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3460637,"name":"Albert M Wright","username":"AlbertEinstein","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/a/f04885/{size}.png","created_at":"2024-12-18T02:17:49.900Z","cooked":"\u003cp\u003eMy team is looking into getting a new drive station laptop as our old one has broken. We know we need a laptop with an ethernet port and ~16 GB of RAM for some head room. I have spent about ~15 hrs of my life looking for a good laptop at a reasonable price, and at this point, my head is firmly through my desk.  I would appreciate any and all recommendations.\u003c/p\u003e","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":3,"updated_at":"2024-12-18T02:17:49.900Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":29,"reads":158,"readers_count":157,"score":176.6,"yours":false,"topic_id":476919,"topic_slug":"frc-drive-station-laptop-recommendations","display_username":"Albert M Wright","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":53903,"hidden":false,"trust_level":1,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"post_url":"/t/frc-drive-station-laptop-recommendations/476919/1","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":3460664,"name":"Taegen P","username":"tmpoles","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/tmpoles/{size}/156834_2.png","created_at":"2024-12-18T02:55:43.010Z","cooked":"\u003cp\u003eWhat’s your budget for a “reasonable price”? We use a Lenovo ThinkPad E15 Gen 4 AMD (15\") - in general Lenovo has sales pretty often and ThinkPads are quite durable, and some models come with the ethernet port.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eIf someone on your team (a parent) is willing to lend their Costco membership you can also go there/shop online from them - they have a handful of MSI laptops with a LAN port from what I can see online.\u003c/p\u003e","post_number":2,"post_type":1,"posts_count":3,"updated_at":"2024-12-18T02:55:43.010Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":150,"readers_count":149,"score":30.0,"yours":false,"topic_id":476919,"topic_slug":"frc-drive-station-laptop-recommendations","display_username":"Taegen P","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":21565,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"4476 Mentor"},"post_url":"/t/frc-drive-station-laptop-recommendations/476919/2","custom_user_title":"4476 Mentor","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3460671,"name":"Jim Sokoloff","username":"sokoloff","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/sokoloff/{size}/231724_2.png","created_at":"2024-12-18T03:28:22.662Z","cooked":"\u003cp\u003eWe have older laptops (Thinkpads) with built-in Ethernet ports.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eI also got several new-to-us, 3-4 year old laptops with USB-C and will be looking into testing USB-C based converged hubs [with power delivery in and Ethernet out over that one connection].
